## Project Setup

- Login to Perlmutter:

  ```bash
  ssh <your_nersc_username>@perlmutter.nersc.gov
  mkdir -p /global/cfs/cdirs/m4388/$USER/
  cd /global/cfs/cdirs/m4388/$USER
  ```
